arts.sum: He had arguably Liverpool's best chance of the first half with a header that went over the ball just past the 10-minute mark. With just a few minutes left of stoppage time, substitute Jeremie Frimpong played a ball into the box, which took a hit off the arms of fellow substitute Hannibal Mejbri.
